description.en: In the fantasy story, the demon king Leonis sealed himself away for 1,000 years in order to prepare for the final battle, but when he woke up, he found himself in the body of a 10-year-old boy. A beautiful young woman named Lisellia from the Holy Sword Academy then says to him, "Why were you locked up in such a place? It's OK now, this big sister will take care of you!" Under Lisellia's care, Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused, Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

title.en: The Life of a Returning Officer

description.en:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
description.id: Cerita tentang Choi Jong-hyuk, ketua tim intelejen investigasi kejahatan, ketika dia ingin menemui jenazah ibunya, ia mengalami kecelakaan misterius lalu entah bagaimana dia kembali ke tahun tahun 1997.

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: My Younger Sister Was a Genius

altTitles.en: My Younger Sibling Was a Genius

description.en: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!

title.en: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en: After being reincarnated into the Tianwu Continent, Ye Yun activated the Multiverse Devouring System and received the reward of a million times attack speed in the beginner's gift package. From then on, he became an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, in the world of martial arts, speed is paramount. Do you think I was just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I just executed thirty-five thousand people with a single sword strike and eighty-seven thousand people with a single sword swing, while also unleashing various boxing techniques and secret arts.

Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

description.en:
The Office Lady (OL-san), who looks forward to stopping by at the convenience store on the way home from work. And Shibasaki-kun, the poker-faced high school part-timer, who gets stirred up by OL-san for some reason. A heartwarming manga about two people who pass by each other at the convenience store!
___

高校生のコンビニバイト君とOLさん（＋α）のほのぼの胸きゅん８Pオリジナル漫画です。
年齢差＆身長差あり。
ヤングガンガンにて連載決定しました！
これからもどうぞ応援よろしくお願いしますฅ•ω•ฅ
description.pt-br: Shibasaki é um estudante do ensino médio que trabalha em tempo parcial em uma loja de conveniência. No trabalho, ele encontra uma pequena mulher e se vê apaixonado por ela. Da mesma forma, o interesse da mulher pelo jovem aumenta gradualmente, principalmente devido ao seu rosto parecido com o do gato dela. A cada breve encontro, o estudante e a senhora se aproximam lentamente durante os cinco minutos que compartilham na loja de conveniência.

description.en:
Red, who was a member of the Hero's party acting as a scout, strategist and negotiator, is the elder brother of a young girl that has the Divine Protection of the Hero and that battles against the Demon Lord. He has the Divine Protection of the Guide, which grants him a high initial level. As this Protection only grants him that and nothing else - no magic, martial arts prowess, or supernatural ability - he gradually becomes unable to keep up with the battle. As a consequence, one of his companions, a Sage, accuses him of not being a true companion, snatches all his equipment and kicks him out of the party leaving him just a copper sword.  
  
Having his heart completely shattered, Red distances himself from the battle against the Demon Lord’s army despite knowing that the fate of the world rests on it, aiming to live an inconspicuous life alone at the frontier town of Zoltan as he earns money to open a herbalist shop by utilizing the knowledge he acquired throughout his journey.  
  
Together with the Half-Elf Carpenter living downtown and the Princess who couldn’t become the Hero’s companion, he aims to live a slow life in the frontier of the world governed by a person’s inborn Divine Protection!
description.ja: 初期レベルが高い『導き手』の加護を持つレッドは、次第に戦いについていけなくなり勇者のパーティーから追い出されてしまう。辺境の地へ流れたレッドは、薬草屋を開業して第２の人生をスタートさせるのだが――!?
description.pt-br: A história acompanha Red, um aventureiro que é expulso da grupo de heróis após ser apontado como um atraso para os demais guerreiros, já que, mesmo tendo sido escolhido, ele não tem grandes habilidades mágicas ou físicas. Sendo jogado fora pelos seus companheiros, Red se afasta das batalhas e decide viver uma vida pacifica em uma cidade distante, mas as constantes cobranças do seu passado, assim como o aparecimento de uma bela garota chamada Rit, e de seus antigos membros de equipe, faz com que não seja tão simples assim viver do jeito que Red espera.

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.

description.en:
"Beauty cannot be real power."

Cayena, the Imperial Princess, was known as the most beautiful woman in the Empire. She was a woman who knew nothing but evil and luxury. However, she was destined for ruin: she would be used as a chess piece by her younger brother to secure his throne and killed by her crazy husband.

"I'll make you the emperor."

"…Sister, you're going to make me the emperor?"

"In exchange, give me freedom."

She had to change things before she became *that* Cayena.

---
I woke up as Kayena Hill, the novel’s villainess, praised as the greatest beauty in the empire. Who knew that her story would catch my attention because I was her in my past life? Destined for terrible ends, I’ve died twice—but I refuse to die a third time as a pawn in someone else’s scheme. I’m no longer the vain and naïve princess. Now that I know how the story will unfold, I’ll turn the tables around and have everyone dancing to my tune. This time, I’ll be the one pulling the strings.

---

description.ru:
Принцесса Каена, прославившаяся своей красотой на всю Империю, не ведает ничего, кроме алчности и злобы. Долгое время она пыталась избавиться от своего младшего брата-тирана, но встретила смерть от руки своего мужа.
— Я помогу тебе стать Императором.
— Сестра… Вы обо мне?..
— Но в обмен… ты подаришь мне свободу.
До того, как «я» стану принцессой Каеной.

帝国的皇女，卡也娜，被誉为帝国最漂亮的女人。 她也是一个除了邪恶与奢侈以外一无所知的女人。 但是，她注定会灭亡：她的弟弟用她作为棋子来保住自己的王位，而最终卡也娜也会被自己疯狂的丈夫杀死。 “我会让你成为皇帝。” “……姐姐，您是指我吗？” “作为交换，请给我自由。” 她必须在成为那个卡也娜之前扭转局面。

Although Chihiro has drawn the winning ticket, this is no ordinary honor. Each day the student-council members must risk their lives to save the school from various forces of evil.
A new type of romantic comedy full of laughter and excitement, featuring two "boys who have turned into girls," is about to begin!

description.en:
In return for a business loan of 50 million yen, the prestigious Kamiya family gave their daughter Haine away to the Otomiya family. Haine, now an Otomiya, is appointed to the student council of the exclusive Imperial Academy, a private school for the aristocracy. Even though Haine is of proper lineage to be on the council, she finds herself struggling to find her place among the many secrets of its elite members, especially those of the president who holds her heart - Shizumasa Togu, aka "the Emperor."  
  
Haine has been in love with Shizumasa Togu from the day she read the picture book he wrote as a child. She enrolls the Imperial Academy to be close to him and is accepted as a member of the student council. But with that, dark secrets start to reveal themselves! Why does "The Emperor" act differently? Is Haine really in love with Shizumasa? Why did her father sell her and why doesn't her mother write to her anymore?  
  
Includes the following extra stories:  
  
Volume 1  
- Hydrangea, the Unspoken Love Veiled by the Rain  
  
Volume 4  
- I Walk the Night  
- The Labyrinth of Maora's First Love  
- On Monday I Fell in Love with You  
- The Postman's Delivery Diary  
- Go for It! Riko's First Love Story!!  
  
Volume 5  
- Kusame, Komaki, and the Key to Their Love  
After Komaki confesses and Kusame accepts unwillingly, Kusame tries to break up with her, but how?  
  
Volume 8  
- Shoujo Eve Ringo Jikake no 24 Ji (Shoujo Eve: Eve's Applework 24 Hours, 少女イブ☆林檎じかけの２４時)  
"Kawaii”… Eve has come to hate this word. "Kawaii" has ruined her life and made her a social outcast. Yet she still has hopes Niikawa will return her feelings for him, that is if the rowdy class idol Kashii doesn't spoil everything first!  
  
Volume 9  
- Strawberry Milk and Chocolate Coffee  
  
Volume 11  
- The Water-Bubble Princess  
  
- Umi no Chikyuugi Nocturne (The Globe of the Sea: Nocturne, 海の地球儀・夜想曲 (ノクターソ))  
Searching for the meaning of people's lives is the mission that is given by God. The reason for my birth… It's okay if it was just to meet you that night.  
  
- Shinshi Doumei Cross Special Side Story  
After Komaki confesses and Kusame accepts unwillingly, Kusame tries to break up with her, but how?
description.pl: Shoujo Eve Ringo Jikake no 24 Ji: Eva jest dziewczyną, której wszyscy mówią, że jest "kawaii" (jap. śliczna). Jednak zamiast się z tego cieszyć, dobija ją to, ponieważ nie ma z tego powodu żadnych przyjaciół. Jednak ciągle ma nadzieję, że przynajmniej Niikawa-kun odwzajemni jej uczucia, no ale co w tym wszystkim robi denerwujący Kahii-kun?

description.en: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
description.ja: 三次元に興味ナシのオタクな高校生・新宮清一は、ひょんなことから学校一の不良少女・綾女古都子に告白される。当然の如くこれを断固拒否！　……した清一だったが、古都子は「じゃあ、お前の理想になってやるよ！」とメインヒロインのようなツインテ美少女に変貌して、強引なアプローチで迫り始め…？
description.pt: Aramiya Seiichi é um estudante ordinário… Um otaku dos eroges que perdeu todas as esperanças nas garotas em 3D devido um certo incidente. Um dia, após ele comprar alguns materiais novos devido uma frustração em consequência de uma experiência frustrante com uma "personagem perfeita" de um eroge, ele encontra uma garota delinquente prestes a ser estuprada por um grupo de homens. Por um acaso ele acaba salvando ela, e por este acaso a sua vida acaba mudando completamente...
description.ru: Когда Сейчи учился в младших классах, он получил психическую травму из-за некой девушки. С тех самых пор, он с недоверием относится к девушкам, и испытывает отвращение к не девственницам. Сейчас Сейчи эроге-отаку, ученик старшей школы, однажды вечером он оказывается свидетелем попытки изнасилования девушки группой людей, случайно привлекая внимания насильников, он использует смекалку и успешно спасает себя и девушку. Девушка оказывается известной хулиганкой, и о ней часто ходят не очень хорошие слухи, а что не менее важно, девушка эта – одноклассница Сейчи, Аямэ. После того дня, она влюбляется в главного героя, и решает добиться его расположения любым способом. Видя потуги девушки, учительница Сейчи просит его помочь Аямэ стать нормальной девушкой, на что тот неохотно соглашается. Так и начинается история о парне, который пытается исправить хулиганку, попутно устраняя все нажитые ею слухи, и о девушке, которая хочет любви.

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

altTitles.en: The World Is Bound To Save You

description.en:
Contains five short stories.  
  
1-2. Sekai wa kimi (w)o Sukuu!  
Harusawa Hiro, a 16-year-old girl, is always saying what she thinks and has no friends. One day, she yells at the famous Yamazaki Ryou from class C.  
  
3. Boku no Candy / My Sweet Heart  
Kubo Yukiya confesses to the girl he likes: Hoshino Mimi! She looks like an angel but is nothing like that at all…!  
  
4. Clear Note  
Hasegawa Rumi is a rather shy girl that likes books. One day, she has to do the class-duties with the popular Kazama. They seem to have nothing in common…  
  
5. Green Boy x Blue Girl

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en:
The hot and sticky hot summer romance of five writers! Enjoy hot summer
with [<Mr. Blue Hot Summer BL Short Story!>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_2020hot_wz)

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

description.en:
There are two kinds of people with special abilities: villains, who are driven by their evil desires, and psykers, who pursue justice and work against villains.

Cassian Lee is a very powerful psyker with a good heart. But one day, when he visits his friend in Greece, things take a wrong turn. Following an unexpected chain of events, Cassian ends up in the body of a Korean high school boy... who has just become a villain! 

Will his sense of justice win in the end or will he end up becoming a cold-blooded villain?
description.es-la: "¡Debes convertirte en el mayor mal para luchar contra el mal real!" Kasian muere tras ser incriminado por el asesinato de un compañero. Justo cuando pensaba que todo había terminado para él, su alma se transfiere a un niño ... ¡Un psíquico popular y de primera clase que era la envidia de todos se convierte en un villano de la noche a la mañana!

description.en:
Seeing it brings misfortune; defiling it brings a curse? Introducing a new era of strangeness, abandoning seriousness!

On a stormy day, a landslide destroys a fence, and siblings who ventured into a long-prohibited area encounter a terrifyingly bizarre creature...
"I'm a curse god, you know!? Don't you think anything of this grotesque form?!?"
The unflappable siblings, rather than being scared, casually call the creature "Dara-San" and grow fond of it!?

Seemingly scary but not at all! A new era of occult comedy that leaves seriousness behind.
description.es:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.
description.es-la:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.

description.en:
Seo MoonYeob was the world’s greatest superhuman, who sacrificed himself after saving humanity.

Thought to have been dead, he returns 17 years later to a now-peaceful world,
and the superhuman sport faces seismic change.

The story of a modern-fantasy sports-action starts now!
description.ko:
인류를 구하고 홀로 희생한 영웅, 최강의 초인 서문엽.
죽었다고 알려진 그가 17년 후의 평화로운 세상에 돌연 귀환하면서
초인들의 스포츠 <배틀필드>에는 지각변동이 일어나기 시작한다.

본격 현대 판타지 X 스포츠 X 액션!

title.en: I Killed the Player of the Academy

description.en:
I killed the player.

He was a real son of a bitch…

He loved me too much and was a sociopath.

Now that I'm back in time, I'll kill him before being manipulated again and save the harem's girls who will help me win the video game's scenario!
description.ko:
플레이어를 죽였다.
죽일 만한 놈이었다. 아주 X새끼였거든.

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

altTitles.zh: 我们牵手吧~你是我的花~

description.en: Kusunoki Azuki and Daizu are close siblings who live in the Arisuno apartment complex. Their next door neighboor is Azuki's childhood friend Tachibana Chika, who has feelings for her. One day, two brothers who are close to their ages, Hiiragi Mizuki and Ryuusei, move into their other neighboring apartment. A heart throbbing neighborhood graffiti starts now!
description.pt-br: Kusunoki Azuki e Daizu são irmãos próximos que moram no complexo de apartamentos Arisuno. O vizinho ao lado é o amigo de infância de Azuki, Tachibana Chika, que tem sentimentos por ela. Um dia, dois irmãos quase da mesma idade, Hiiragi Mizuki e Ryuusei, mudam-se para o outro apartamento vizinho. Um graffiti de bairro pulsante começa agora!

altTitles.pt-br: Você é Cheia de Surpresas, Yamada!!

description.en: Tonari is a college student starting in the spring. He starts living alone in an apartment, but there is a quirky woman next door who is a little out of the ordinary and basically "not wearing clothes"!? A moratorium comedy full of gaps begins! (MTL)
description.ja: 作家志望の純情青年・戸成は春から大学生。アパートでひとり暮らしを始めたものの、隣に住んでいたのは、いつもパンツをはいてない変な女で！？エロ漫画家女子と一つ屋根の下！
description.pt-br:
Tonari é uma estudante universitária que começou na primavera. Ele começa a morar sozinho em um apartamento, mas tem uma mulher peculiar ao lado que é um pouco fora do comum e basicamente “sem roupa”!?  

Começa uma comédia moratória cheia de lacunas!

description.en:
The one and only weapon to take down the Dark Lord.
The Holy Sword.
And the Warrior who lost it…
Warrior seeks and seeks until he finds the Holy Sword.
10 years, 20 years, 30 years… From the Dragon’s Nest till the Spirit King’s Hideout
The Warrior seeks the Holy Sword still to this day.

I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~
Mooyoung, a snobbish dreamer who wants to fight! But what are your wishes? 'Be a partner!'

Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.
They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

description.en:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

description.pt-br: Cheon Yoo-ok, um jovem órfão que sobrevive pedindo esmolas, porém, à medida que ele se aprofunda nos mistérios de uma seita, segredos sombrios e ameaças desconhecidas começam a surgir, em um mundo onde intrigas e conspirações estão por toda parte, ele terá que superar desafios inimagináveis para proteger aqueles que ama e descobrir seu verdadeiro destino.

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en: Shin Min-cheol had been recruited to the world called ‘Anhelles’. He was one who had lived 200 years fighting to survival and destroying the enemies, in the end the ruler of the continent Zero, was lead to the victory of war. And finally, Min-cheol, who has finally returned to Earth leaving the peace of Anhelles behind, wants to live his long-awaited life as a ‘rich unemployed man’, but another conspiracy begins to approach him? If they are after me, they have to find me first. All I have to do is go and fight it off!

altTitles.en: I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor

description.en:
Ma Jinsung was once a top-ranked player in Arsia Chronicle, but he was brutally killed by his trusted leader. After that, he thought he'd wake up in his room... not 10 years in the past! 

Now, prepared to exact his revenge, he jumps right back into the game. But this time, his job class is voodooist, and he gets bonuses for killing other players. The only downside -  if he dies in the game, he dies in real life.

Can Jinsung get his revenge without causing too much carnage? Don't bet on it...
